name: learning-godot-2
description:
Arrow keys move; space key jumps

This is a continuation of an initial prototype.

Learning to use Godot to make a simple platformer.

This changes the artwork completely for some from kenney.nl. It adds a baddie that can kill you and can be killed; if you hold jump while you kill it, you'll get extra bounce height. This is key to beating the game as it allows you to reach the platform with the key that unlocks the goal.



Credits:
https://soundcloud.com/stevenobrien/chiptune-thing-no-3-victory
https://kenney.nl/assets/platformer-characters
https://kenney.nl/assets/abstract-platformer
